creator: Debabrata Samal
descriptionHtml:
In Bharat Affairs app, we have included Daily Current Affairs for All Govt Exams i.e., Bank, SSC, IBPS, UPSC, Railways, State Govt exams and All other Competitive Exams in a single APP.

“Current affairs” are updated on a daily and monthly basis. We provide relevant current affairs daily to help users to keep an eye on current happenings.

Bharat Affairs app has a unique, simple and user-friendly UI that will help the users to easily read the current affairs in a simple manner.

Users can also switch between different dates and read the articles of that particular day.

** Key Features of this valuable Bharat Affairs App **
- Best User Experience and Interface
- Read Daily News in 100 words or less.
- 100% free. No hidden fees and charges.
- No Login required.

** Useful for All Competitive Entrance & Recruitment Exams **
* Banking & Insurance *
- SBI - PO, Clerk
- IBPS - PO, Clerk, RRB
- RBI - Grade B Officer, Assistant
- Insurance - LIC AAO, NICL AO, GICL AO, UIIC AO

** Government Recruitment **
- SSC - CGL, CHSL, Stenographer
- Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) NTPC

Disclaimer:
App does not have any connection with the Government and it does not represent any Government or political entity.
App is developed to help students in their competitive Exam Preparation.

*If you find any problem with intellectual property violation or DMCA rules break than please mail on affairs.bharat@gmail.com*

Created using Flutter and Dart.
descriptionShort: A simple app to read Daily and Monthly Current Affairs.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Now you can download PDF for daily Current Affairs.
Click on PopUp Menu Button on the Right Top Corner then, click on 'get PDF' to download PDF.
PDFs will be saved in Default Documents Folder.
